title: Microbiology Fundamentals: Interactive Multimedia-Based Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Biology Terminology and Basic Smartphone Operation Skills
context.additional_context: Education centered on understanding microbiology concepts using VR/animation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can simulate and explain basic principles of bacterial genetic phenomena with 80% accuracy
Learners can visualize and reproduce microbial proliferation processes through interactive quizzes conducted at least three times
Learners can correctly define and apply 20 core microbiology terms using a glossary

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
